description:
Check out the original style at userstyles.org
Last Updated @ 2:41am PST If you're a frequent user of Justin.tv, then you're well aware of all the annoying ads and all of the unnecessary crap that exists on the channel pages. This userstyle REMOVES ALL OF THE TRASH and streamlines the channel page! Everything flows together and in one uniform column! Check it out and let me know what you think!
